attendance.title: Attendance
attendance.location_disabled_message: Location services are disabled. On web browsers, location may not be available. You can still mark attendance without location data.
attendance.location_required_message:
Could not get your location. This might be due to:

• Browser location permission denied
• Location timeout (browser issue)
• Running on HTTP instead of HTTPS

Location is mandatory to mark attendance. Please grant location permission and try again.
attendance.location_warning_message: You are {distance} away from the project site. Please ensure you are at the correct location.
attendance.location_retry_message:
GPS location is required to mark attendance.

Do you want to retry getting your location?
